content1.title: Welcome!
content1.text: My name is JO}{N, I'm a freelance web programmer and 3D modeler.

content3.title: Services
content3.textCard1: Modeling of characters, objects and environments for video games or 3D printing.
content3.textCard3: Development of web pages or applications and assembly advice.
content3.textCard4: Virtual programming classes focused on the web, mobile or desktop environment from basic to advanced.

content4.title: About me.
content4.text:
My name is John López, I am a freelance programmer. I have 3 years of experience working on multiple projects, mainly focused on the web environment. In addition, I have experience as a teacher in the area of ​​technology and as a 3D modeler making pieces focused on 3D printing.
